Blog.post: Well, I sold my online Magic cards today and made around $347 Yay! And it's all tied up in bills!!! WOOOT! Also... umm, busy at work... yay. I miss Brenna :( Every time I talk to her on the phone I'm both happy and sad... I love talking to her but I miss her much... It'll be ok though :) I'd rather it be like this than not at all.
If this company were real and for some reason I had to get dial up internet... I would sooo get it through them: urlLink Crappy Dialup
I love him sooo much: urlLink I adopted a cute lil' ninja fetus from Fetusmart! Hooray fetus!
My computer monitor blew up... That sucks... :( Goodbye 100 dollars Also, I passed gas at work and the lady near me didn't say a word... that's funny.

Well, I just got back from spending my day at Cory's house this weekend. I got this new game called Munchkin which is a card game that is a parody of a Dungeons and Dragon type RPG game played out with cards. The point is to get to level 10 first. The game is quite funny... I laughed quite loudly when Jason had to fight a level 8 Gazebo, especially when it said "You cannot get help to fight, you must face the Gazebo alone" If you have ever been a DnD or just an RPG player, this parody of a basic dungeon romp will make your day. I love it. Also got some Magic in... Jason and I played our league match vs. Cory and Clay. Because of a huge Arcbound Crusher of mine and a nice little Loxodon Warhammer (and Clay getting mana screwed) me and Jason ripped through them quite easily... but that's luck of the draw for ya :) And, I'm still missing Brenna... but I guess that should be taken for granted by now.

Warning, don't go to this link if you are weak of stomach. urlLink http://www.ratbags.com/rsoles/history/2001/candacenewmaker.htm These people should, in my opinion, be put to death for this. I'm sorry... if I wrapped up a anyone, much less a child, and made them vomit on themselves, soil themselves, and then suffocate to death, I'd probably be in prison for life... I think I read that these people got 16 years... I hope their torment from guilt ruins the rest.

I've been reading the Lego version of the bible... and find it quite amusing. It really cuts straight to what is said making it easy to understand... but being literal translation it can be funny. I suggest reading this one: urlLink CLICK ME! For some reason, the end really made me laugh. Edit: Another good one... urlLink CLICK ME TOO!

Weee... I really like Brenna lots... it's like seeing her here was like cement. It's like... now she has been here I can't stop thinking about her... the cement has dried and I can't see it leaving me any time soon. I feel she is something about me now. Gah, that sounds weird eh? Oh well... I want her to come back already... I miss her lots. I hope it's possible. Anywho, if you read this, find this song and listen to it: "Mad World" by Gary Jules. I really like it and suggest everyone to hear it once. Work is still boring... but at least I get to read... I picked up a new book yesterday... Four Past Midnight by Stephen King... which means I'll either like it lots or hate it... but it's big and will take time to finish if I only read it during down time at work (I don't have a lot of that currently cus it's pretty much summer here and that's when the stuff gets busy). Lately I've been thinking that I'm weird... I really like entertainment and books and stuff based on occult and religious themese (stuff about magic, monsters, devils, the apocolypse, divine workings, etc.) but my outlook on these things in the real world is totally skeptical. I get the skeptic society e-mail each week and frequently read James Randi's site urlLink http://www.randi.org . I guess the weird magic stuff interests me, but I won't just buy into it without proof. Anyways... that was a random thought. Ok, lame joke that makes no sense unless you actually say it instead of reading it: Bear walks into bar. Deer sitting at bar says "Bear, may I buy you a drink?" Bear responds "I would...........like that". Deer says "Why the big paws?".

Well... I'm a little late posting this because I was busy living :p My last night with Brenna was wonderful. She made me very happy. I love her much and from what I know she feels the same way. I'm hoping she can come and visit again soon. I probably made an ass out of myself somehow... but she still liked me... that's a sign :p I really do miss her a lot right now. Lots of stuff makes me think about her. I hope she doesn't decide I suck any time soon :p Anyways, I'm gonna make her come down again ASAP... I can do that cus... um, I'm awesome and stuff. Edit: I love how the Google Ads at the top of my blog are now advertising something about Health Care Policy... I didn't know my blog related to such important things.
Well... I think she likes me :p I am definately a happy guy. I need to sleep now cus when I wake up I get to see her again.
Well, I just got back from hanging out with Brenna and her mom. Hmmm, all I can say is that I like her lots. I hope she likes me, I think she does. I'll know more tomorrow :) :) :)

I really hate it when people ask me if they woke me up at work. Yeah... I work 3rd shift... I've been doing it almost 2 years now, you'd think I'd figure out how NOT to sleep at night by now. I have yet to fall asleep on the job, but I have had the "did I wake you up" asked to me at least 100 times. Or they come up to me at what I consider my afternoon/evening (4 AM) and act like I look sleepy when I know damn well I don't. I think I just hate people. And by people I mean everyone that isn't someone close to me. *BURRRP*

Well, I had a long night at work. Had alot of packets to do. I work at a condo complex and I have to stuff all these packets for the people arriving to stay in the condo the next day. Well, we had 48, so that takes about and hour and a half to complete. Along with answering phone, checking a lady in, moving that lady when she didn't like her condo, and all my other duties, the night was long. Then I get home and need to run my virus checking software, which took forever and I couldn't talk to Brenna for a long while :( I spent that time playing Amplitude on my Playstation 2. For those of you (and by you I mean the imaginary people who are also not reading this) who haven't played that game, basically dots move by on the screen corresponding to one of three buttons. You push the button when the dot gets to the target area. If you time it right you play part of a song (by groups like Blink 182, Slipknot, Quarashi, and some other good and shitty music). If you complete a track it plays by itself for a bit and you can move from drums to like guitar and play the guitar. The point is to keep the song going. Anyways, I played 3 songs, and I would say it took me about an hour each to beat (well, I didn't beat the last one, Slipknot is hard). Now before you say I suck, I am playing on the hardest difficulty... my fingers are now hurting... this game is crazy in how it makes you move your fingers. I was very proud of myself for knocking two more songs off. Anyways, after failing on the Slipknot song many times, my computer is finally done and now I can talk to Brenna (which I am doing currently). So, I am pretty happy... but I am sleepy. Gah, I wish I didn't have to sleep, or was rich... either would help free up time. Anyways, sorry for boring post. I'm gonna go talk to Brenna for a bit and maybe fall asleep after.

Well, I'm back from work. It sucks. Graveyard shift isn't bad, but if I could I wouldn't work. I would just be rich, you know... without all the bother of earning it. Pretty boring night... read some at work. Reading a book for an RPG game called Demon: The Fallen. It was about big ugly demon guys that are mean and they try to stop the other "good" guys. There was a part in it about a girl being fed Alpo dog food. Anyways, I got home this morning and played the demo for Guild Wars. It's the demo they are running at E3 and while E3 is going on, they let anyone at home play the demo too. Game isn't that bad, especially for the fact there won't be a monthly fee for the MMORPG. Try it out. Now I'm talking to Brenna (the girl that loves me... yeah I still don't get it) so I am happy, I missed her. She's coming to visit this weekend, which will make me happy (or sad if she ends up hating me, I do suck ya know). Anyways, wish me luck and all.
Ok, one more thing before I sleep: What Marvel Super Hero Am I.... urlLink Woot, one more promise down, I'm on a roll. All you doubters can now eat my butt.

You need to see the movie Donnie Darko. Yeah, I know it sounds like some silly movie about a goth super hero, but it's not at all. You need to see this movie, then you need to go to and figure out the website for the movie (www.donniedarko.com) and then maybe you'll understand it. The acting is good, the story is very intruiging and trying to figure it out is the fun part. Anyways, I'm sure the people that will be reading this are going to be my friends that I'll probably see and tell them to watch it in person (and some of them have seen it already). But if for some reason you're not my friend or I didn't tell you, go see da movie. Also, my mother took the Afflictions personality test... she's syphilis (who knew?)

YAY! One of those personality test things ALREADY! urlLink urlLink Take the Affliction Test Today! urlLink A Rum and Monkey disease. The best part about this is if you mouse over the picture it says "I am Rabies, Grrrrrr!" That made me laugh, Tee Hee!

I just wanted to make a few promises about this blog. Yes, I promise to post personality tests that tell me if I'm some amusing thing like a super hero or a disease, or what layer of hell i'm going to etc. Yes, I promise to post about personal stuff that no one would care about. Yes, I promise to whine when stuff goes wrong. YaY!
Well, this is my first blog and my first post... not sure if anyone will ever read this, but hey... I can look at it and go wow, that's a bunch of stupid stuff I wrote, hot damn.

Ok, just some quick notes (yeah I know I haven't updated enough). I am happy. Brenna makes me happy. I love her. Things are doing ok. I'm paying off my bills (not super fast, but way better than I was). It's about to rain and I'm about to sleep. Here is a link to a cool blog you have to read: urlLink http://www.livejournal.com/users/ripley_the_cat/

We had people locked out of their condo for hours, had a dominos pizza delivery guy call police on people HE gave pizza to for free, had a hole in the ceiling from a cart getting caught IN the elevator and pulled up into the ceiling (the door auto open thingy didn't work eh?) and I had the regular busy crap... oh well, one more day til my weekend... weeeeee

Hmm, this is what it says I'd be made of if I were a drink... wow... I sound like one of those frilly drinks with an umbrella... damnit :( I don't even drink and I'm ashamed How to make a hollow1 Ingredients: 5 parts friendliness 5 parts silliness 3 parts energy Method: Layer ingredientes in a shot glass. Add a little lovability if desired!

urlLink Which Mortal Kombat warrior are you? JOHNNY CAGE Special Moves: Shadow Kick: Toward, Away, Low Kick urlLink urlLink Click Here to Take This Quiz Brought to you by urlLink YouThink.com quizzes and personality tests.

Well, I'm in a little pain right now cus I'm sick... bah Oh well Also... people piss me off... people driving, annoying guests at work, etc. Oh well, that's ok, stuff is still good... Brenna still loves me and that makes me happy. Our new Magic league started up and we got 6 people this time... will I dominate again??? Probably not... I already lost twice to Clay... but I'll do my best. Anyway, I'm going back to talking to Brenna, because she's awesome and I love her.
Go here please, and enjoy the wonderous sights. urlLink http://www.teamfishcake.co.uk/toast/
Well, one step closer to world peace... at least virtually: scrolling="no" hspace="0" vspace="0" frameborder="0" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" width="200" height="80">

Well, I got my "new monitor" today. I put the quotations because it's really a refurbished Dell monitor. It's nice though and I think it's better than the one I had. No dead pixels, no screen scratches... very nice. So I'm happy. Now my mom won't have to use my computer to play Free Cell anymore (Thank God). Oh yeah and I'll be working to make this number better: urlLink

This may be obvious to peoples... but I just want to say it anyways. I love Brenna. She makes me very happy. I miss her much and will be a happy man when I can see her again. Brenna, I love you. You make me happier than I have been.
hollow1 Look out for the m HOLE Username: From urlLink Go-Quiz.com Hmm... *shrugs* I guess you better watch out.

Yay... I love work Wait... no, I like money... work sucks. Anyways... I had a lady tell me her comforter has vomit on it... but it doesn't end there, she just HAD to explain that her grand daughter got sick on crab legs... and then she had to explain how it happened and then reiterate that it was crab legs. Bah Then this other annoying call RIGHT as I was leaving took forever and I think the guy was trying to get a free night... but he was just being a total cockbite. Anywho... I'm home now and talking to Brenna, so I am happy. weeeeee

I get a call from my boss yesterday. She says "Sorry for calling you at home, but I just want you to know that from now on 3rd shift employees will be getting 2 extra dollars per hour instead of just 1". WOOT! More money for me! I thought she was calling me cus I screwed up, but instead, she gave me money... I do not complain.

Well, we finished our Magic league this week... and I came out as the overall winner with 30 wins (closest person behind me was at 20 wins :p so I pwned). Also saw the movie Bubba Hotep. If you like mummies, Elvis, retirement homes, or JFK conspiracies, you should see this movie. Now I'm talking to Brenna so I must go... (she's wonderful btw).
YAY!!! Saturday... as in the Day after TOMORROW... Brenna will be here... I am sooooooooooo happy... and I'm excited and all that fun stuff... :) :) :) Anywho... I love Brenna :p

Happy birthday to me... I turn 24 today. Not very eventful... I plan on celebrating with friends after Brenna comes down next week. I did get a card from Brenna today that also came with a letter. It made me very happy, and even though she knows it, I just want to say that I love Brenna with all of my heart. Yay!
urlLink My cat wakes me up every morning.
urlLink I lika to say a HOLY CRAP
I went to Cory's house. Went to Card Store. Played D&D. Killed lots of stuff in D&D. Slept. Went home. Talking to Brenna.

Well, I'm playing Anarchy Online again. They had a good special to start playing again so I signed me up and I started an account for Brenna too. I really like playing with her... it makes it worth it. It's good to have something to do together. I'm not sure how much she likes the game yet... but she doesn't seem to hate it (yet). Jason started playing again too so we might be able to play with him as well, so that's another bonus. Anywho, work is still normally boring... nothing else is going on.
I gave Jason some God Damned oatmeal.
